Title: The World Awaits
Description:
You know what's a sure sign of toughness? Helping out the community in the Dragon Isles! 

There's plenty of problems to solve here. Show me how tough you are by helping out!
ObjectivesText: Complete 10 World Quests in the Dragon Isles.
RewardText:
I heard about all the things you did! If that's not tough, I don't know what is.

Keep up the pace.
